You just won't find a nicer Sgc 10 T205 Cy Young. Front displays like a 5. Back has some paper loss and residue from scrap book removal. $285 Dlvr'd. Drop me an email if interested and please take a look at my website for new cards recently added for sale. N's, T's, E's, postcards, etc. Link can be found in my signature below. Payment via Paypal is a-okay with no extra fee. Thanks all, Tony 
[url]andreatny@q.com[/url]

[IMG]http://i9.photobucket.com/albums/a95/andreatny/t205youngfront.jpg[/IMG] [IMG]http://i9.photobucket.com/albums/a95/andreatny/t205youngback.jpg[/IMG]
Tony, that is a beauty. Good luck with it.

Tony,

Email sent -- I'll take it.

Greg
if it falls through, let me know.  I am looking for a 10 or an A and would be interested.

Card is sold. Thank you Greg..........
Email sent....
                         Tony
